html:
That ye may suck, and be satisfied. The righteous will be like a child who is returned to its mother (49:15-17; 60:16). They will receive both nourishment and comfort from the mother, who is Zion (symbolized by Jerusalem).

breasts of her consolations. The inhabitants of Zion will be safe and at peace, content and satisfied.

ye may milk out. The children of Zion will be blessed with spiritual nourishment and emotional comfort (at the breast of their mother, Zion) without limit.

delighted with the abundance of her glory. The children of Zion will rejoice to receive of the blessings of Zion's glory, which will be available in great abundance.
